title: 权限的错误。。。
author: hahahahah
txt_content:
============================================================================

2014-12-14 12-49
=============================== GM 错误报告 ===============================
= = = 错 误 报 告 = = = 2.0 (Pre2.10.1.4) (Phoenix) =

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: 下列文件无法解析.

replies.author: 网络摆渡客
replies.txt_content:
明显的格式错误Caused by: while scanning a simple key
in "<reader>", line 17, column 5:
        -- essentials.help.factions
        ^
could not found expected ':'
in "<reader>", line 18, column 5:
        - essentials.helpop
        ^复制代码
格式注意事项：
1、任何缩进都是空格缩进，不得使用tab缩进
2、属性和值之间必须有空格，比如abc: 100是正确的，abc:100是错误的
3、权限格式为“    - 权限名”，“-”前后的空格数要正确

replies.author: BlackJocker
replies.txt_content:
- essentials.helpop 附近有格式错误 检查一下
可以发上来我帮你看看
